definitions: A compact knoblike growth on a plant that develops into a leaf, flower, or shoot.
A part of an organism that may develop into a new one.
A small protuberance on an animal or an organ that is an early developmental stage of a more mature part.
To begin to grow or develop.
examples: The rose bush is covered in buds.
The plant began to bud in early spring.
The idea began to bud in his mind.
